dynamic_line: Greetings. What brings you all the way out here?
I'm simply a druid, and these are my associates. I'm part of a circle, you see. We are considered masters of druidism and its practices.

responses.text: Why are you sitting in the middle of nowhere?
Is there anything I can do for you?

dynamic_line: Our practice revolves around our connection to nature, and I have found that being around nature helps that.
